item.title: Journal Paper
item.description: Bad news! Our paper entitled “Improved Scalable Analytical Model for Predicting the Performance of SPM Machine Considering Magnet Shape and Magnetization Pattern” was IEEE Transactions on Magnetics rejected by Therefore we decided to submit to anather journal :) But another paper “Design and Quantitative Analysis of Asymmetric Flux Reversal Permanent Magnet Linear Machine with Reduced Leakage Flux” was accepted.

item.title: Life
item.description: I was really happy to see my new colleagues, who are nice to me!

item.title: Course
item.description: I was really happy to be one of the team member. The knowledge of permanent magnet is useful for the motor designer.

item.title: Journal Paper
item.description: I would appreciate all the co-authers for their contribution in the paper entitled “The Scalable Analytical Model for Calculating the Magnetic Field of Surface Mounted Permanent Magnet Motor”. This paper entitled was submitted to IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics on 21-Apr-2023ï¼Œ revised on 09-Aug-2023 and 15-Nov-2023, accepted on 31-Jan-2024.

item.title: Experiment
item.description: I’m really happy to learn from it! Happy New Year!

item.title: Journal Paper
item.description: I would appreciate all the co-authers for their contribution in the paper entitled “Hybrid Analytical Model of Permanent Magnet Linear Motor Considering Iron Saturation and End Effect”

item.title: Journal Paper
item.description: I’m honored to contribute to thw good work “Quantitative Analysis of Asymmetric Flux Reversal Permanent Magnet Linear Machine for Long Excursion Application”, which was accepted on 23-Dec-2024. Congrats to Yiming.
